metadata.title: CVE-2022-32250 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.description: net/netfilter/nf_tables_api.c in the Linux kernel through 5.18.1 allows alocal user (able to create user/net namespaces) to escalate privileges toroot because an incorrect NFT_STATEFUL_EXPR check leads to ause-after-free.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
